# callCapabilities

**Instance Property**

The audio-video capabilities of the call.

## Declaration

```swift
var callCapabilities: INCallCapabilityOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to limit your search to audio-only calls or video calls. You can specify both options.

## Getting the Call History Details

- **dateCreated**: The range of dates associated with the call records.
- **callTypes**: The types of calls to search.
- **callType**: The call type.
- **unseen**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has seen the call yet.
